Description.Name: SRM Inferno Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Inferno SRMs are missiles containing a napalm-like substance that coats their target in a gel which burns for a short period, applying Heat. Usage may lead to dangerous forest fires, if used in the wrong conditions.

SRM Inferno Ammo Bins each contain 100 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
